data.title: Jamais Vu
data.meta_description: This is a sub-unit track recorded by Jin, j-hope, and Jung Kook. The French term "jamais vu" describes the opposite of the more familiar "deja vu": a situation that feels new and novel, though assuredly experienced before. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G3x17KyNJtg Produced by¬†Arcades, Bad Milk, Marcus McCoanWritten by Marcus McCoan, Owen Robers, Matty Thomson, Max Lynedoch Graham, James‚Ä¶
data.text:
This is a sub-unit track recorded by Jin, j-hope, and Jung Kook. The French term ‚Äújamais vu‚Äù describes the opposite of the more familiar ‚Äúdeja vu‚Äù: a situation that feels new and novel, though assuredly experienced before.

Produced by Arcades, Bad Milk, Marcus McCoan

Written by Marcus McCoan, Owen Robers, Matty Thomson, Max Lynedoch Graham, James F Reynolds, RM, j-hope, ‚ÄúHitman‚Äù Bang

Clean Translation

I think I‚Äôve lost again

You look like you‚Äôre angry

A glimmering ‚Äúgame over over over‚Äú

If this was a game,

I could just load it again, but

I guess I gotta deal with this, deal with this

real world

It‚Äôd be better if this was a game,

for it hurts too much

I need to heal my medic

but I‚Äôm another star

I blame myself for not having been perfect

Brake in my head, brake in my step, always

I had just wanted to do well

and make you smile but.. damn

üíä Please give me a remedy

A remedy that will jump-start my stopped heart

What am I to do now

Save me, give me another chance

Please give me a

A remedy, a melody

A memory that will remain only with me

If I, at this point, stop,

turn it off, would everything become easier?

I‚Äôm okay but I‚Äôm not okay

Though I mumbled to myself saying I was used to it,

it hurts every day as if it‚Äôs only now the first time

A lacking gamer, that‚Äôs right, I can‚Äôt control myself

It keeps hurting ‚Äòcause of all the trial and errors and fifty thousand other things

All my lyrics, gestures,

and words become scary to me due to my jamais vu

I try to escape all the time

But I am, in fact, caught by you

Even if my shadow grows larger, my life and yours is an equal sign

So my remedy is your remedy

üíä

(Remedy)

I run again, and trip again

(Honestly)

Even if it‚Äôs repeated countless times,

I will still run

So give me a remedy

A remedy that will jump-start my stopped heart

What am I to do now

Save me, give me another chance

Please give me a remedy

(Is it a success? I returned)

A remedy that will jump-start my stopped heart

(I‚Äôll concentrate and make sure to reach you no matter what, falling and tripping)

What am I to do now

(The familiar pain swoops over me in the same way)

Save me

(It‚Äôs not easy this time either)

Give me another chance

(Am I going to give up? No, no never)

I won‚Äôt give up
